title: The Pied Piper of Hamelin
creator_credit: Cosgrove-Hall Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
brief_description: An animated puppet film for children based on the poem by Robert Browning about the events in the town of Hamelin after a plague of rats invade the town. Narrated by Robert Hardy.
creator_credit_for_label: Cosgrove-Hall Productions, Brian Cosgrove and Mark Hall
